name: aspear-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is frozen, it consumes this item to thaw itself. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures freezing.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when frozen to cure frozen.

flavor_text.sword-shield: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from being frozen on its own in battle.
